job_tasks.phrase: Design, implement and maintain reliable, scalable and backend services for DeepL Write
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the development and maintenance of backend services, which falls under traditional software engineering responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Closely collaborate with our Research teams to bring the new functionality of their models to our end users via new features and integrations
job_tasks.justification: This indicates working with models developed by research teams and integrating their functionality into user-facing products, which involves understanding and implementing model capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to monitoring and debugging the services in production, e.g. by defining expressive metrics and ensuring expressive logs
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring, debugging, and defining metrics/logs for production services are core MLOps activities focused on operational aspects of deployed systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate across teams to define shared interfaces and ensure smooth operation in production
job_tasks.justification: Defining interfaces and ensuring smooth operation relates to the integration and reliability of software systems, a key aspect of software development.

soft_skills.phrase: Closely collaborate with our Research teams
smooth collaboration, direct and actionable feedback
monitoring and debugging the services in production

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional backend software development and operations, with only a minor mention of collaborating with research teams on model functionality. There is no explicit mention of core GenAI tasks like prompt engineering, RAG, or fine-tuning, nor specific GenAI technologies.
